description: Sam: "Slow down! We're on our way to that. Listen, you're below that planets surface and ores are sparse. We detected a unique material named Cloggrum that should suffice. Gems and ores you're familiar with are all above and below as well.. I'd suggest gearing up."
Gear.. gear up for what? Again... Joe, this place, all the answers you have and don't have?!?
Sam: "I'm here for your safety first. We'll get to those."
Ya ya, clog you, clog that, food this... I got it.
